articles.content:
Vivo S9E price has been tipped as RMB 2,298 (approx Rs 25,000)

articles.title: Huawei may halve its smartphone production this year - XDA Developers
articles.description: According to a recent report from Nikkie Asia, Huawei is looking to halve its smartphone production this year.

articles.title: Huawei FreeBuds 4i with ANC, 10 hours continuous playback launched in China - gizmochina
